title: Arangini (Italian Rice Balls)
ingredients: ['900ml water', '250g uncooked brown rice', '2 cloves garlic', '1 bay leaf', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '125g thinly sliced prosciutto, chopped', '125g mozzarella cheese, diced', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '3 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '5 egg whites, divided', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '125g dried breadcrumbs', '750ml vegetable oil for frying']
